elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Match the following descriptions to the correct negotiation strategy:

elements.name: question1
elements.title: The aim is to find a solution that benefits both parties. The focus here is on the long-term relationship. This strategy involves understanding the needs of the other party and finding an outcome that is beneficial to both sides.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Match the following descriptions to the correct negotiation strategy:

elements.name: question2
elements.title: In negotiation theory, this strategy describes the best option available to a party if no agreement is reached in the negotiation.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Match the following descriptions to the correct negotiation strategy:

elements.name: question3
elements.title: This is a technique in which one party deliberately makes an initial proposal that sets the basis for negotiation. This anchor influences the subsequent discussions and can guide the expectations and perceptions of the other party.

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Match the following descriptions to the correct negotiation strategy:

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Here, both parties look for a compromise in which each gives up something in order to reach a common result. This strategy is often used when the interests of both parties are partly in agreement and still differ in certain areas.

elements.name: panel4
elements.title: Match the following descriptions to the correct negotiation strategy:

elements.name: question5
elements.title: If one party gives something or makes a concession, it is often expected that the other side will also give something. This principle of reciprocity can be used to achieve fair and balanced negotiation results.
